roo.description: The best free models to get started

landing.introduction: With a range of built-in and extensible Modes, Coder lets you plan, architect, code, debug and boost your productivity like never before.
landing.accountMention: To get started, create your Coder Cloud account. Get powerful models, web control, analytics, support and more.

providerSignup.heading: Choose your provider
providerSignup.chooseProvider: Roo needs an LLM provider to work. Choose one to get started, you can add more later.
providerSignup.rooCloudDescription: The easiest way to start is with the Coder Router: a curated mix of free and paid models at a low cost.
providerSignup.useAnotherProviderDescription: Enter an API key and get going.
providerSignup.noApiKeys: Don't want to deal with API keys and separate accounts?

waitingForCloud.heading: Logging into Coder Cloud...
waitingForCloud.description: We'll take you to your browser to sign up for Coder Cloud. We'll then bring you back here to finish.
waitingForCloud.noPrompt: If you don't get prompted to open a URL, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.havingTrouble: If you've completed sign up but are having trouble, <clickHere>click here</clickHere>.
waitingForCloud.pasteUrl: Paste the callback URL shown in your browser:
waitingForCloud.invalidURL: That doesn't look like a valid callback URL. Please copy what Coder Cloud is showing in your browser.

startRouter: We recommend using an LLM Router:
startCustom: Or you can bring your provider API key:

telemetry.helpImproveMessage: Coder collects error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. This telemetry does not collect code, prompts or personal information. You can turn this off in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink>.
